channel.title: Features and Capabilities on ArangoDB Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Features and Capabilities on ArangoDB Documentation

item.title: Feature list of the ArangoDB core database system
item.description: Feature parity between the Community Edition and the Enterprise Edition is available from v3.12.5 onward. General Graph Database: Native support for storing and querying graphs comprised of vertices and edges. You can model complex domains because edges are documents without any restrictions in complexity. Document Database: A modern document database system that allows you to model data intuitively and evolve the data model easily. Documents can be organized in collections, and collections in databases for multi-tenancy.

item.title: Highlights by Version
item.description: Version 3.12 From version 3.12.5 onward, the prepackaged binaries and official Docker images of the Community Edition include all features of the Enterprise Edition. See ArangoDB Editions for details. All Editions Improved memory accounting: Better tracking and observability of memory consumption for ArangoDB deployments and reduced memory usage. wildcard Analyzer: Accelerate LIKE searches with _ and % wildcards against Views and inverted indexes with n-grams to quickly find candidate matches.
